means: 推理，思考( reason的第三人称单数 )

sentence.Network_en: Specialists see various reasons for the recent surge in inflation.
sentence.Network_cn: 专家们认为目前通货膨胀加剧有多种原因。

sentence.Network_en: The exact locations are being kept secret for reasons of security.
sentence.Network_cn: 确切地点因为安全原因要保密。

sentence.Network_en: The right decision was made, but probably for the wrong reasons.
sentence.Network_cn: 作出的决定是正确的，但理由可能是错误的。

For security reasons the visitors were secarched., 为了安全起见 , 来宾受到了检查.
theoretical discussion on the reasons for homosexuality ., 同性恋成因的理论探讨.
There are at least three reasons ., 至少有三方面的原因.

...或诊断应负的责任。“ 该议员注意到了英国Bolam案中对相关医学观点的限定词————“负责任的“、“合理的“、“值得尊敬的“，认为这些形容词的使用意味着法院应确保医学界的观点应是“有逻辑基础的(logical basis)“。在新的规则下，法院一方面保留了对被告行为评判的最后的发言权从而向医疗业的绝对自主发出了挑战，另一方面，法院对医疗专家意见的再次判断和置之不理还是相当谨慎的。法院对医疗做法和行业观点的干预被限制在了极少数的情形中。不管如何，Bolitho案是英国司法中的一个标志性案件，它基本上扭

entry.def: The reason for something is a fact or situation which explains why it happens or what causes it to happen.

example.ex: There is a reason for every important thing that happens...
example.tran: 每件重要事情的发生都有原因。

example.ex: Who would have a reason to want to kill her?

entry.def: If you say that you have reason to believe something or to have a particular emotion, you mean that you have evidence for your belief or there is a definite cause of your feeling.

example.ex: They had reason to believe there could be trouble...
example.tran: 他们有理由相信可能会遇到麻烦。

example.ex: He had every reason to be upset...

entry.def: The ability that people have to think and to make sensible judgments can be referred to as reason .

example.ex: Mike is my voice of reason. He thinks logically and points out where I'm going wrong.
example.tran: 迈克帮我保持理智。他的思维很有逻辑性，可以指出我的错误。

entry.def: If you reason that something is true, you decide that it is true after thinking carefully about all the facts.

example.ex: I reasoned that changing my diet would lower my cholesterol level...
example.tran: 我推断改变自己的饮食可以降低我的胆固醇水平。

example.ex: 'Listen,' I reasoned, 'it doesn't take a genius to figure out what Adam's up to.'
example.tran: “听着，”我分析道，“要弄清楚亚当想要干什么很容易。”

entry.tran: （常用来暗指不赞成某人的所作所为）只有自己知道为什么，出于自身的理由
entry.def: If you do not know why someone did something, you can say that they did it for reasons best known to themselves. You usually use this expression when you do not agree with what they did.

example.ex: For reasons best known to himself, Algie changed his name.
example.tran: 不知是出于什么原因，阿尔吉改了名字。

entry.tran: 因为；由于；由…引起；以…为理由
entry.def: If one thing happens by reason of another, it happens because of it.

example.ex: The boss retains enormous influence by reason of his position...
example.tran: 老板由于自身的地位而一直有极大的影响力。

example.ex: He pleaded innocent by reason of insanity.
example.tran: 他以精神不健全为由申辩无罪。

entry.def: If you try to make someone listen to reason, you try to persuade them to listen to sensible arguments and be influenced by them.

example.ex: The company's top executives had refused to listen to reason.
example.tran: 公司的高层管理人员拒绝理智行事。

entry.tran: 无缘无故；莫名其妙；没有理由
entry.def: If you say that something happened or was done for no reason ,for no good reason, or for no reason at all, you mean that there was no obvious reason why it happened or was done.

example.ex: The guards, he said, would punch them for no reason...
example.tran: 他说警卫会无缘无故殴打他们。

example.ex: For no reason at all the two men started to laugh.
example.tran: 两个人莫名其妙地开始大笑。

entry.tran: 活着的理由；生存的原因
entry.def: If a person or thing is someone's reason for living or their reason for being, they are the most important thing in that person's life.

example.ex: Chloe is my reason for living.
example.tran: 克洛艾是我活着的理由。

entry.tran: 不知为何;不知什么原因
entry.def: If you say that something happened or is true for some reason, you mean that you know it happened or is true, but you do not know why.

example.ex: For some reason, the curtains were shut...
example.tran: 不知什么原因，窗帘拉着。

example.ex: For some inexplicable reason she was attracted to Patrick.
example.tran: 因为某些无法解释的原因，她被帕特里克所吸引。

entry.tran: 正当的;合乎情理的;理智范围内的
entry.def: If you say that you will do anything within reason, you mean that you will do anything that is fair or reasonable and not too extreme.

example.ex: I will take any job that comes along, within reason...
example.tran: 我会接受任何给我的工作，只要是正当的。

example.ex: It means working, within reason, for whatever time is necessary.
example.tran: 这意味着在合理的范围内花费所有必要的时间工作。

auth_sentence.content: The reasons for such terrifying tales are not clear.
auth_sentence.res_content: The reasons for such terrifying tales are not clear.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The reasons for such terrifying tales are not clear.

auth_sentence.content: There are several reasons why people disliked Pearl Jam.
auth_sentence.res_content: There are several reasons why people disliked Pearl Jam.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There are several reasons why people disliked Pearl Jam.

auth_sentence.content: I think that would be helpful for two reasons.
auth_sentence.res_content: I think that would be helpful for two reasons.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I think that would be helpful for two reasons.

Reasons for this ranged from inheritance disputes to hostility between spouses.
There are good reasons it causes such anxiety," says Lisa Sohmer, director of college counseling at the Garden School in Jackson Heights, N.Y.
Supervisors must identify the reasons for poor performance.
